code: import React from'react';import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import pb from'../../pocketbase';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HeaderSocial=()=>{const[socials,setSocials]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchSocialLinks=async()=>{try{const records=await pb.collection('HomeSocial').getFullList();setSocials(records);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching social links:',error);}};fetchSocialLinks();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"home__socials",children:socials.map(social=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:social.Link,className:"home__social-link",target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:social.Code})},social.id))});};export default HeaderSocial;
